title: Oru Kan Jaadai Lyrics Anjaan Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Movie :Anjaan
Song :Oru Kan Jaadai
Singers :Benny Dayal, Swetha Pandit
Lyricist :Viveka
Music: Yuvan

Oru kan jaadai seithaley
Manam panjaagum thannaley
Idaividaatha anbaley
Ennai venmegam seidhaley

Tharayil pogum megam ivala..
mayangi paartheney
Uyirin koocham podum aval seiyum
maayam oyadhey.

Vaanam endraal thalaikku melea
Irukkum endru ninaithirundhen.
Endhan vaanam ethiril nindru
Punnagaithaal mei marandhen.

Aasai ellam pootti vaithenea
Saavi undhan vizhigalilea
Anumadhikkum paarvai vandhalea
Alli kolven nimidathilea..

Ennalum vendumey
unnodu kaigal serthu
pogum nedupayanam.
Kaadhal ondru dhaan..
irudhi varai vazhum
vaazhvai arthamaakum .Okay

Thodarum potta kadhayai polea
Indha maalai mudigiradhey.
Undhan kangal paarkathaney
Enadhu kaalai vidigiradhey.

Vaaram yeazhu naalum unnalea
Vaanavillaai therigiradhea
Unnai kaana naatkkal ellamea
Karuppu vellai aagiradhey.

Minsaara thottamey
un meni pookum
pookal oru adhirchiyadi.
Kaadhal seiyalaam
Munbu nee paartha
mochai agumpadi..

Oru kan jaadai seithaley
Manam panjaagum thannaley
Idaividaatha anbaley
Ennai venmegam seidhaley

Tharayil pogum megam ivala..
mayangi paartheney
Uyirin koocham podum aval seiyum
maayam oyadhey.
